name: 3D PLATFORMER II
description:
3D Platformer II is my sequel game to 3D Platformer on Unity. This is my first game where I decided to make a sequel due to the success of the previous. 3D Platformer II was designed to be easily understandable from an artist point of view so I can expand my game development because creating a sequel game will help me gain a greater understanding because games have always made sequels and have always tried to do better than the previous game. 

3D Platformer II uses game elements like Level select world, collectables, interactive menu, health system, a boss battle, state-based enemy AI and animating characters. I program the game on C# and developed transferrable and strong problem-solving skills. I had to download a new version of Unity where I learned the new capabilities of 3D development in Unity which helped me learn more about game development.

Controls: W (Move Up), A (Move Left), S (Move Down), D (Move Right), Spacebar (Jump)
